description: President Macron's comments about "Islamist separatism" have angered some in the Muslim world.
title: France urges Arab nations to prevent boycotts over Macron's cartoons defence
title_page: France urges Arab nations to prevent boycotts over Macron's cartoons defence - BBC News
maintext:
We will not give in, ever.
We respect all differences in a spirit of peace. We do not accept hate speech and defend reasonable debate. We will always be on the side of human dignity and universal values.
